three temporal multi-choice scenarios a virtual think space and a website from

to design the tag cards we critically reviewed there is a rich space of

bit of conceptual clarity here so from these models uh we extracted 16
key factors impacting acceptance and design one card for each of these
we also organize them in three color coded categories health for uh in red individuality and social so social
